name: Constitution (WIP) First Ever Game
description:
FEEDBACK AND INFO APPRECIATED :D

We began by following Heartbeasts Rpg tutorial to learn Godot for the first time...

My friend is more experienced in pixel art  than me, whom is assisting me but for my first try I hope the character art (Almost Finished All Animations) is good!

We've been working on my own twist afterwards

The idea is you will be on a quest to defeat 3 bosses that each drop an item needed to heal the Dragon who sends you on this adventure! After you defeat them all and return him to full health, you will go take out the final boss (In theory Phase) together

So far we have a functioning level and a prototype of the first boss ready.
